name: Defeat Mario in 3 different battles

Obtain the The Boss spirit
Finish with >200 orbs
Clear 7 environmental blocks
Defeat 3 spirits from the Animal Crossing series

Defeat Wario in 3 different battles
Summon 3 spirits using materials bought from a shop

Obtain the Strong-Wind, Lava-Floor, and Poison Damage Reduced skills-185
Finish in Space
Win a fight after getting your Shield broken 3 times
Spend 5k in the shops
Win 3 fights at over 200%
Acquire 4 spirits from chests
Defeat 3 Assist Trophies
Defeat Snake in 3 different battles
Use an ice attack with 3 different characters
Obtain the M. Bison or Shine Sprite spirit
Never use a neutral primary spirit
Press the Red Button in Console City
